entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers later in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late in the evening then southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
